derak.responsiveDes: Design and development of a responsive version of the company website to deliver an improved user experience across mobile devices.
derak.mobileDes: Added key functional sections, including service purchasing and renewal, optimized specifically for mobile devices.
derak.BillingDes: Optimized the billing section to enhance performance and improve overall user experience on mobile platforms.
derak.AdvancedDes: Implemented advanced filtering mechanisms tailored to the custom requirements of enterprise-level clients.
derak.AnalyticsDes: Designed and developed analytical charts and data visualizations for finance, human resources, and administrative support teams.
derak.FinancialDes: Conducted research and development on financial and technical data analysis to present insights effectively within the user interface.
derak.RefactoringDes: Refactored and optimized critical sections of the front-end codebase, resolving bugs, removing redundant logic, and improving load times by up to 40%.
derak.onboardingDes: Designed and implemented the onboarding process for new team members in the front-end and UI/UX departments.
derak.MentorshipDes: Mentored and trained new employees by introducing project components, development workflows, and coding standards to accelerate onboarding and productivity.
derak.TrainingDes: Provided hands-on training and experience transfer to reduce time-to-productivity for newly onboarded team members.

pars.description1: Design and development of CRM and BI Dashboard website with Parallax Scroll and interactive animations.
pars.description2: Development of the business intelligence analytics dashboard for sales, purchase, human resource and customer finance team
pars.description3: Implementation of live charts and dashboards. There are manual KPIs and AI-generated KPIs with real-world data of the different businesses

about.aboutDes: I am Siavash Mir, front-end developer from Iran, Shiraz. I have strong experience in front-end development, creating responsive websites with smooth animations and modern UI interactions. I specialize in building dynamic, user-friendly interfaces and optimizing websites for different devices and screen sizes.
